SQL_STMT_U.val: select c.code, extract(year from b.transaction_date) year, sum(a.amount) from pc_transaction_amount a inner join pc_transaction_base b on b.id = a.pctb_id inner join pc_category c on c.id = a.pcca_id where b.pere_id = ~1 and b.transaction_date between to_date(~2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(~3, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by c.code, extract(year from b.transaction_date)

select c.code code , extract(year from b.calc_date) year , sum(-a.amount * a.factor) indirect_cost from pc_portfolio_amount a inner join pc_category c on c.id = a.pcca_id inner join pc_portfolio_base b on b.id = a.pcpb_id where b.pere_id = ~1 and b.calc_date between to_date(~2,'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(~3,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by c.code , extract(year from b.calc_date) order by 1, 2

Text.val: Accrued interest can not be summed over a period.

SQL_STMT_U.val: select 'P', sum(b.value) from pc_portfolio_base b where b.pere_id = ~1 and b.calc_date = to_date(~2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') union select 'A', sum(b.value) from pc_account_base b where b.pere_id = ~1 and b.calc_date = to_date(~2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') union select 'I', sum(a.amount*a.factor) from pc_portfolio_amount a inner join pc_portfolio_base b on b.id=a.pcpb_id and b.calc_date = to_date(~2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') where b.pere_id = ~1 and a.pcca_id = ~3

select sum(amount) amount, sum(a.amount*(to_date( ~3 , 'YYYY-MM-DD')-b.transaction_date+1)/(to_date( ~3 , 'YYYY-MM-DD')-to_date( ~2 , 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1)) weigthed_amount from pc_transaction_amount a inner join pc_transaction_base b on b.id = a.pctb_id inner join pc_category c on c.id = a.pcca_id where b.pere_id = ~1 and c.code = 204 and b.transaction_date between to_date(~2 , 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date( ~3 , 'YYYY-MM-DD')

select sum(costs) from ( select round(sum(-pa.amount*pa.factor),2) costs, prc.prc_id from pc_portfolio_amount pa inner join pc_portfolio_base pb on pb.id = pa.pcpb_id inner join pc_category pc on pc.id = pa.pcca_id inner join performance_rap_koppeling prk on prk.prk_perf_calc_cat = pc.code inner join performance_report_class prc on prc.prc_id = prk.prk_perf_rap_cat where prc.vbg_id = ~1 and pb.pere_id = ~2 and pb.calc_date between to_date(~3,'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(~4,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by prc.prc_id union select sum(ta.amount), prc.prc_id from pc_transaction_amount ta inner join pc_transaction_base tb on tb.id = ta.pctb_id inner join pc_category pc on pc.id = ta.pcca_id inner join performance_rap_koppeling prk on prk.prk_perf_calc_cat = pc.code inner join performance_report_class prc on prc.prc_id = prk.prk_perf_rap_cat where prc.vbg_id = ~1 and tb.pere_id = ~2 and tb.transaction_date between to_date(~3,'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(~4,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by prc.prc_id)
